definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: weigh (NH id.; Ar. 3aqula be heavy, 3iqalun heaviness, weight, 3aqalun load, OAram. [[תקל]] weigh, Aram. [[תְּקַל]], tqal (weigh), pay, [[תִּקְלָא]] shekel, but also (OAram. Zinj.) [[שקל]], [[שקלן]] Lzb:382; 4qal lift up; As. šaḳâlu, weigh, šiḳlu (appar.) = [[שֶׁקֶל]]; Eth. saqala: hand up, weigh; Ph. [[משקל]] weight; cf. Frä:202, also Gk. si/glov (LXX si/klov) Lag:M ii. 357 Lewy:Framdw. 118 f.;—on connex. of mngs. cf. weigh trans. and intrans. = Germ. wägen, wiegen, also heave, heavy, heft (= weight, obs. or colloq.));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]: 2Sa 14:26, Is 40:12; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִשְׁקִל]] Ex 22:16, sf. [[יִשְׁקְלֵ֫נִי]] Job 31:6, etc.; Inf. abs. [[שָׁקוֹל]] Job 6:2; cstr. [[לִשְׁקוֹל]] Es 4:7; Pt. act. [[שׁׂקֵל]] Is 33:18, 2Sa 18:12 read perhaps pass. [[שָׁקֻל]], v. infra,—
weigh, human subj., acc. rei 2Sa 14:26, Is 46:6 ([[ב]] of scale); fig., ´[[י]]: subj. Is 40:12 also (acc. pers.) Job 31:6 (both c. [[ב]] of scale); cf. Inf. abs. sub

definitions.title: Niph.;
definitions.body: weigh precious metals intrusted to one, [[ל]] pers. Ezr 8:25, [[עַל־יׇדָם]] v:Ezr 8:26, acc. rei om. v:Ezr 8:29 ([[לִפְנֵי]] of superior).

weigh out a price (i.e. pay): acc. of silver Ex 22:16 (E), 1Ki 20:39, Zec 11:12, Je 32:10 ([[ב]] of scale), Is 55:2 (c. [[ב]], in exchange for); +[[ל]] pers. Je 32:9, Ge 23:16 (P); +[[עַל־כַּפַּי]] 2Sa 18:l2 (read perhaps [[שָׁקֻל]], so We Kit:Kau Bu Buhl), ´[[עַל־יְדֵי פ]]: Es 3:9, [[עַל־גִּנְזֵי הַמֶּלֶח]] Es 4:7
Pf. 3 ms. [[נִשְׁקַל]], subj. rei Ezr 8:33 (pass. of Qal v:Ezr 8:25 f.); Impf. 3 ms. fig. (+ Qal Inf. abs.), [[לוּ שָׁקוֹל]] [[יִשָּׁקֵל כַּעְשִׂי]] Job 6:2.
be weighted out, as price, Job 28:15.
